<div class="border-bottom">æˆ‘æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªborder-bottom</div>

.border-bottom { 
    overflow: hidden; 
    position: relative; 
    border: none!important; 
} 
.border-bottom:after { 
   content: ""; 
   display: block; 
   position: absolute; 
   left: 0; 
   bottom: 0; 
   width: 100%; 
   height: 1px; 
   background-color: #000; 
   -webkit-transform-origin: 0 0; 
   transform-origin: 0 0; 
   -webkit-transform: scaleY(0.5); 
   transform: scaleY(0.5);
}
